note.p: Birth: West Pembroke, Maine, USA (27 February 1899)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB vol 17 pp 80-81
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1982 vol 28 pp 1-25, plate, by Sir Frank Young and C N Hales
References: D C Martin, 'Visit by the Assistant Secretary to some North American Scientific Institutions' in NR 1952 vol 9 pp 356-364
A F Bristow, T Barrowcliffe and D R Bangham, 'Standardization of biological medicines: the first hundred years, 1900-2000' in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 271-289
Notes: Another honour he received was the CC (Canada) - date? Middle name given as Herbert in index to BR and in all YB entries, but as Henry in R and citation in Printed List of Candidates.
